title: Arrow Medium True Type font for PC
content:
Does anyone know where I can find ARROW MEDIUM FONT IN TRUE TYPE FORMAT FOR PC or something that looks very close to it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415001813im_/http:/typophile.com/files/georgebrown_diploma2_3764.jpg)
author: maximus

comments.content:
TF Arrow is available from [Treacyfaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415001813/http:/www.treacyfaces.com/050806_TFArrow_2c5a.html).  
I suggest you ask them about format and platform.
